channel.title: CVE Feed for CodeRevolution -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CodeRevolution -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-9265|2024-10-01T08:30:18.477Z -- coderevolution -- echo%20rss%20feed%20post%20generator
item.description: The Echo RSS Feed Post Generator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in all versions up to, and including, 5.4.6. This is due to the plugin not properly restricting the roles that can set during registration through the echo_check_post_header_sent() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to register as an administrator.

item.title: CVE-2024-31290|2024-08-02T01:46:04.960Z -- coderevolution -- demo%20my%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in CodeRevolution Demo My WordPress allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Demo My WordPress: from n/a through 1.0.9.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-5969|2024-07-30T15:10:24.553Z -- coderevolution -- aiomatic%20-%20automatic%20ai%20content%20writer%20%26%20editor%2C%20gpt-3%20%26%20gpt-4%2C%20chatgpt%20chatbot%20%26%20ai%20toolkit
item.description: The AIomatic - Automatic AI Content Writer for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary email sending vulnerability in versions up to, and including, 2.0.5. This is due to insufficient limitations on the email recipient and the content in the 'aiomatic_send_email' function which are reachable via AJAX. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to send emails with any content to any recipient.

item.title: CVE-2024-25917|2024-07-17T14:02:36.506Z -- coderevolution -- wp%20setup%20wizard
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in CodeRevolution WP Setup Wizard.This issue affects WP Setup Wizard: from n/a through 1.0.8.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-25917|2024-04-25T08:39:27.195Z -- coderevolution -- wp%20setup%20wizard
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in CodeRevolution WP Setup Wizard.This issue affects WP Setup Wizard: from n/a through 1.0.8.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-31290|2024-06-04T17:37:09.683Z -- coderevolution -- demo%20my%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in CodeRevolution Demo My WordPress allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Demo My WordPress: from n/a through 1.0.9.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-34435|2024-06-10T14:06:43.470Z -- coderevolution -- aiomatic
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in CodeRevolution Aiomatic.This issue affects Aiomatic: from n/a through 1.9.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-5969|2024-07-27T07:33:46.658Z -- coderevolution -- aiomatic%20-%20automatic%20ai%20content%20writer%20%26%20editor%2C%20gpt-3%20%26%20gpt-4%2C%20chatgpt%20chatbot%20%26%20ai%20toolkit
item.description: The AIomatic - Automatic AI Content Writer for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary email sending vulnerability in versions up to, and including, 2.0.5. This is due to insufficient limitations on the email recipient and the content in the 'aiomatic_send_email' function which are reachable via AJAX. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to send emails with any content to any recipient.

item.title: CVE-2024-5969|2024-08-01T21:25:03.180Z -- coderevolution -- aiomatic%20-%20automatic%20ai%20content%20writer%20%26%20editor%2C%20gpt-3%20%26%20gpt-4%2C%20chatgpt%20chatbot%20%26%20ai%20toolkit
item.description: The AIomatic - Automatic AI Content Writer for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary email sending vulnerability in versions up to, and including, 2.0.5. This is due to insufficient limitations on the email recipient and the content in the 'aiomatic_send_email' function which are reachable via AJAX. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to send emails with any content to any recipient.

item.title: CVE-2024-34435|2024-08-02T02:51:11.440Z -- coderevolution -- aiomatic
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in CodeRevolution Aiomatic.This issue affects Aiomatic: from n/a through 1.9.3.
